This searchable table includes most of the functions covered in my book Practical R for Mass Communication. You can search (and sort), either by function or package name. 

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

mytabledata <- readxl::read_xlsx("../../BookMarkdown/functions.xlsx") 
mytabledata <- dplyr::arrange(mytabledata, Function)
pacman::p_load(DT)
mytable <- DT::datatable(mytabledata, rownames = FALSE, options = list(
pageLength = 50,
  lengthMenu = c(50, 100, 200)
)
)

mytable
```
